scripts.supabase:restart: npm run supabase:stop || true && npm run supabase:start
scripts.supabase:db:dump: mkdir -p supabase/tmp && supabase db dump --local > supabase/tmp/schema_dump.sql && echo '✅ スキーマ情報を書き出しました → supabase/tmp/schema_dump.sql'
scripts.supabase:db:migration:file_history: ls -1 supabase/migrations || echo '⚠️ migrations ディレクトリが存在しません'
scripts.supabase:db:migration:dump: mkdir -p supabase/tmp && echo '📜 マイグレーションDDL履歴一覧' > supabase/tmp/migration_ddl_history.sql && echo '--------------------------------' >> supabase/tmp/migration_ddl_history.sql && for f in $(ls supabase/migrations/*.sql | sort); do echo "\n▶ $f" >> supabase/tmp/migration_ddl_history.sql; echo '--------------------------------' >> supabase/tmp/migration_ddl_history.sql; cat "$f" >> supabase/tmp/migration_ddl_history.sql; echo '\n' >> supabase/tmp/migration_ddl_history.sql; done || echo '⚠️ supabase/migrations が存在しません' >> supabase/tmp/migration_ddl_history.sql && echo '✅ DDL履歴を書き出しました → supabase/tmp/migration_ddl_history.sql'
